title: Investments into Indian hospitality to exceed $2.3 bn over the next 2-5 years: CBRE
description: The report, titled ‘Indian Hospitality Sector: On a Comeback Trail’ released on Wednesday stated that the total investment during 2020-2023 is likely to exceed $ 0.4 billion. 12,000 hotel rooms likely to be added in 2023 and the number of hotel rooms is expected to grow at an expected CAGR of 3.3% by 2025.
